scripts.run-dev-server: nodemon --exec "npx acts-util-apilib && tsc && (export $(cat .env | xargs) && cd dist && SCRIPTDIR=../scripts node main.js)"
scripts.build-docker-image: export $(cat .env | xargs) && docker buildx build $DOCKER_BUILDX_FLAGS --platform linux/arm64 -t $DOCKER_REGISTRY/aczwink/ame-backend --push .
